text: Horsfieldia amplomontana is a species tree in the family Myristicaceae. It is endemic to Mount Kinabalu (in Sabah, Malaysia) where its habitat is old-growth and second-growth forests. ==References== amplomontana Category:Endemic flora of Borneo Category:Trees of Borneo Category:Flora of Sabah Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Horsfieldia amplomontana
